title: "Sources"

The project uses data from IPUMS Microdata of people with income, English proficiency, and other demographics.

### Dataset
- **Title**: American Community Surveys (ACS)
- **Time Period**: 2021-2023
- **Source**: U.S. Census
- **Link**: [View Dataset](https://www.census.gov/newsroom/press-kits/2024/acs-5-year.html)
